description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Mild Curried Chicken & Pasta   recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Mild Curried Chicken & Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 40g McCormick Mild Chicken Curry Recipe Base
1 bunch broccolini, halved lengthwise (if stems thick), cut into thirds
500g pasta, cooked to packet directions (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a large pan with oil and heat over MED – HIGH heat. Add the chicken and brown then transfer to a plate and set aside. Add onion, capsicum and broccolini to the pan and stir- fry for 3-5 minutes or until softened and beginning to char.
Reduce heat and return chicken to the pan. Stir through the recipe base, coconut milk and water and simmer for 10- 15 minutes or until chicken and vegetables are cooked through.
